message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway and save you some money, but I still need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,800 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $11,200. This is a fair price for both of us, and allows me to get closer to my goal while still giving you a good deal. Let's finalize this!

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $11,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
